article_title: Obamacare Has Not Slowed Down Premium Growth Relative To Wages

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: It is only when we compare slow health spending to even slower growth in wages that the real truth about Obamacare is revealed: Obamacare has not slowed down premium growth relative to wages at all!
